.. _`samtools mpileup`:

SAMTOOLS MPILEUP
================

Generate pileup using samtools.





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule mpilup:
        input:
            # single or list of bam files
            bam="mapped/{sample}.bam",
            reference_genome="genome.fasta"
        output:
            "mpileup/{sample}.mpileup.gz"
        log:
            "logs/samtools/mpileup/{sample}.log"
        params:
            extra="-d 10000",  # optional
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-212-g458009d7/bio/samtools/mpileup"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.
